name: Velociti
description:
Short 3D platformer made in Godot Engine. I find the movement reminiscent of Counter-Strike Surf maps. The only currently present level can be completed in about 40 seconds (when you master the controls).

  • Features janky multiplayer with 5 KiB/s down load per player. There is no collision with other players, and, sadly, you can't yet race against them.
  • I didn't make the options yet, so you can't rebind the controls, and would have to adjust game volume via your operating system's mixer.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys
MoveMouseRotate view
SpaceJump
Right mouse button
Zoom
